alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 24 at 5:52AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following county, Wake. * WHEN...Until 815 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 551 AM EDT, Automated rain gauges indicated minor flooding was occurring due to heavy rain from thunderstorms last evening and early this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... locations along Walnut Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
